name: .HBR2
summary: Learn about .HBR2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an HBR2 file with several HaxBall replay players, including the default player included with HaxBall. To open an HBR2 file with HaxBall's replay player:
Go to HaxBall's Room list screen.
Navigate to and open your HBR2 file.
The replay your HBR2 file contains will then begin playing.
If you want to both watch and view statistics about your HBR2 replay, you can do so with Haxball Replay Analyzer.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .hbr2 file in HaxBall Replay Analyzer
images.caption: HBR2 file open in HaxBall Replay Analyzer
